user_description: If your Mr. Right appears, the others will suddenly become insignificant and I hate to be one of them.
I don't believe what you say,but you do,knowing somebody by your heart,instead of your eyes.
I don't like waiting. But if waiting means having you, then I will wait until I have youï¼
